document_data.name: Cormanthyrian Elfblade
document_data.mainbody: A '''''Cormanthyrian elfblade''''' was a magical [[sword]] produced in the old [[elf]] realm of [[Cormanthyr]], where the ''[[keen]]'' enchantment was first developed.
document_data.Description: They carried the symbols of the old elven houses of [[Cormanthor]].
document_data.Powers: An ''elfblade'' was a ''+1 [[longsword]]'' with the ''[[keen]]'' quality.
document_data.Creation: The ''[[keen edge]]'' [[spell]] was required for their creation.
document_data.Notable ''Cormanthyrian elfblades'': * [[Darrask Baergil]], Captain of the [[Riders of Mistledale]], was known to have possessed a ''Cormanthyrian elfblade'', although he kept it and did not use it for combat.{{Cite web/Candlekeep forum/Questions for Ed Greenwood (2011)/Captain Baergil}}
